name: Endless (Jennifer Foreman)
description:
Thank you for visiting and playing!  Please excuse our current bugs. The game play does not end with it's final battle due to an unforeseen bug.

However, we hope that you enjoyed the adventures of Tara, the Tawi Toor Engineer, in the world of Tahalm . 

If you could please fill out this survey for your feedback it would be well appreciated

https://goo.gl/forms/1Bi1nTBx4zeVlTnq1

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldOfEndless

Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/makingavideogame

Thanks!

- Jennifer and James
